attributes.additional_details:
It is a human right for all women to have a baby.  Women whose partners have had children with a previous partner, are unable to access IVF in many areas on the NHS, as outlined by some CCG's (Clinical Commissioning Groups). This is unfair, as you cannot change the past, so why should this hinder a womans right to IVF?

Please sign this petition to stop CGC's using this criteria, see link below:

http://www.nhs.uk/chq/Pages/889.aspx?CategoryID=54
